name: Mia's Journey
description:
Mia just found an umbrella! She thought it can be useful to her little sibling to be protected from the snow, so she went on a journey to bring it back with her.

This game is a gift for Tuhkis, my giftee of this Secret Santa 2021 :) I hope you will enjoy it!

Playing in full-screen is recommended. If at anytime you are blocked because of a glitch, opening the umbrella (Shift) will most of the time fix it ;)
